A Pen created at CodePen.io. You can find this one at http://codepen.io/recored/pen/QNaaEP.

 Click the switch to change between daytime and nighttime reading

Forked from [Jesper Strange Klitgaard Christiansen](http://codepen.io/jesperkc/)'s Pen [Day/night switch](http://codepen.io/jesperkc/pen/pydMqb/).
